title: Enhanced photocatalytic removal of bromate in drinking water by Au/TiO2 under ultraviolet light
content:

Ying Xu, Shuili Yu, Cong Huang, Zheng Xu
In this study, a novel Au/TiO2 photocatalyst was prepared for the reduction of bromate. This new method can be combined with UV disinfection, which is very convenient for integrating this new method in current setting of water plants.
